title: What does encantado de conocerle mean in English? - Answers
text: "Encantado de conocerlo" is a Spanish phrase that translates to "Nice to meet you" in English. It is a polite and common way to greet someone when you meet them for the first time. De tu means: of your in English. "Debajo de" means "underneath" or "below" in English. "De su vida" in English means "of his/her life." "Y yo de ti" translates to "and I, about you" in English.
